text: This is a list of areas and neighbourhoods in Chennai by region. The city is divided on the basis of composition into four major parts: North, Central, South and West. ==North Chennai== * Manali new town * Kodungaiyur East * Kodungaiyur West * Madhavaram * Madhavaram Milk Colony * Mathur MMDA * Puzhal * Moolakadai * Kolathur * Parry's Corner * Royapuram * Villivakkam * Perambur * Pudhupakkam * Tiruvottiyur * Vyasarpadi * Manali * Tondiarpet * Vallalar Nagar * Ennore * Old Washermenpet * Kavangarai * New Washermenpet * Korukkupet * Mannadi * George Town * Seven Wells * Basin Bridge * Sowcarpet * Park Town * Periametu * Choolai * Veppery * Pattalam * Pulinanthope * M.K.B Nagar * Sharma Nagar * Selavoyal * Edapalayam * MAnjambakkam * Ponniammanmedu * Sembiam * T.V.K Nagar * ICF Colony north * Central * Padi * Korattur * Lakshmi puram * Ambattur north * Oragadam * Ayapakkam * Pattravakkam * Thirumullaivoyal north * Avadi north * Redhills * Ajax * Kathivakkam * Ernavur * WIMCO * Sathangadu * Rajakadai * Kadambakkam * Kathirvedu * Moolakothiram * Erukanchery * Broadway * Jamalia * Kallikuppam * Pattabiram * Kosapet ==West Chennai== * Alapakkam * Anna Nagar * Annanur * Agathiyar Nagar * Ambattur * Bhuvaneshwari Nagar * Chinmaya Nagar * C.M.D.A Colony * Defence Colony * Padi * Ayappakkam. * Thiruvallur * Arakkonam * * Korattur * Mogappair East * Mogappair West * Arumbakkam *Avadi * Pudur * Maduravoyal * Koyambedu * Ashok Nagar * KK Nagar * KK Nagar West * KK Nagar East * Karambakkam * Vadapalani * Saligramam * Shakthi Nagar * Sri Iyyappa Nagar * Virugambakkam * Alwarthirunagar * Valasaravakkam * Thirunindravur * Thirumangalam * Thirumullaivayal * Thiruverkadu * Nandambakkam * Nerkundrum * Nesapakkam * Nolambur * Ramapuram * Mugalivakkam * Mangadu * M.G.R Nagar * M.G.R Garden * Pallavan Nagar * Porur * Poonamallee * Moulivakkam * MMDA Colony ==South and East Chennai== * Mylapore * Perungudi * Sholinganallur * Alandur * Adyar * Besant Nagar * Triplicane * T. Nagar * Thiruvanmiyur * Saidapet * Guindy * Madipakkam * Nanganallur * Velachery * Taramani * Pallikaranai * Keelkattalai * Kovilambakkam * Thoraipakkam * Neelankarai * Injambakkam * Chromepet * Pallavaram * Tambaram * Perungalathur * Palavanthangal * Peerkankaranai * Mudichur * Vandalur * Kolappakkam * Kandigai * Mambakkam * Pudhupakkam * Palavakkam * Varadharajapuram * Medavakkam ==Suburban Chennai== Suburban Chennai includes almost half of the places in the districts of Kancheepuram and Tiruvallur. Suburban Chennai is commonly called as Greater Chennai. ==Northern Suburbs of Chennai== * Pazhaverkadu * Ponneri * Athipattu * Sholavaram * Minjur * Red Hills * Ennore ==Western Suburbs Chennai== * Avadi * Pattabiram * Thirunindravur * Iyyappanthangal * Kattupakkam * Poonamallee * Thirumazhisai * Thiruvallur ==Southern-western Suburbs of Chennai== * Pallavaram * Pozhichalur * Anakaputhur * Pammal * Kundrathur * Mangadu * Chrompet * Thiruneermalai * Keelkattalai * Chitlapakkam * Tambaram * Selaiyur * Madambakkam * Medavakkam * Sithalapakkam * Kovilambakkam * Nanmangalam ==Suburbs along ECR and OMR of Chennai== * Karapakkam * Kanathur * Muttukadu * Kelambakkam * Kovalam * Siruseri * Category:India geography-related lists
title: List of neighbourhoods of Chennai
